Welcome to Everything2

Welcome to Everything2! We're a large collaborative writing site, a public forum for writers to share their thoughts, their ideas, and their art. We have a wide collection of writing on the site, from recipes to biographies, fiction and poetry, essays and histories. (When we say everything, we mean it!)

What makes E2 such a unique place is that we believe that feedback is crucial for a writer's development.

  • We have an experienced set of volunteer editors ready to assist writers on any matter, whether technical, philosophical, or otherwise.
  • All writing submitted to the site can be voted on by the site's other users, and we encourage constructive criticism through our messaging system.
  • Our [Voting/Experience system|unique user leveling system] mixes just the right amount of silliness and rewards to help you grow as both a member of the site and as a writer on your own.

So take a look around, check out the Cool Writeups section below for a sample of what we have to offer, or use the search box to discover more of E2. (Be sure to check out [Everything University] for a good rundown on the ins and outs of becoming a successful member at the site.) And, if you like what you see, hit the "Sign Up" link at the top of the page, (Note to self: Add "sign up" link to top of page.) [Create a New User|create a username for youself], log in, and let's begin! Happy noding!

The Best Of E2

This week on the best of E2, check out a beautiful poem by [etouffee], the mysterious and alluring [Stendhal Syndrome] by [Lometa], and the stirring underground classic [Happy Birthday from Planet Motherfucker], plus works on [Charles de Gaulle], [Frankie goes to Hollywood], and a review of the cult classic [Rosemary's Baby].

Everything's Most Wanted

This week, our focus is on the final frontier: outer space. Describe a celestial body, explain a strange phenomenon, or review a good space traveling sci-fi movie, and you can earn up to 50XP courtesy of the [e2science] usergroup!

And don't forget to check out [Everything's Most Wanted] for more writeup ideas with big rewards behind them ...

 
Letters To The Editor
This week we decided to answer some brewing questions about nuking: When do we do it? When do we not do it? Are there any written guidelines? Why did writeup X get nuked? And there's also a fun question about whiskey, courtesy of [TheDeadGuy]. [Link|Check it out.]
